name: Black Hole Avoidance Simulator 3000
description:
Quick! Get in your space ship! 

We have just received news there are black holes all over this area of space. We need you to go and rescue astronauts who are not aware of the danger they are in. Be careful out there if you hit a black hole it’s game over! 

Move your Space ship around using the arrow keys to pick up the Astronauts. 

Watch out for planets and avoid the black holes as long as you can.

(Art based on actual image of Black Hole, first pictured by the Event Horizon Telescope in April 2019)
